mk.imdb.entity

Class IMDbMovie

  • java.lang.Object
    • mk.imdb.entity.IMDbEntity
      • mk.imdb.entity.IMDbMovie

  • public class IMDbMovie
extends IMDbEntity
    Class that represents a Movie.
    Author:
    Mirko Polato

                            throws IMDbResponseException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The movie
        Throws:
        IMDbResponseException - Throws whether the server response is not a success.

      • fullSearchByTitle

        public static java.util.List<IMDbMovie> fullSearchByTitle(IMDbSearchByTitleParameters params)
                                                   throws IMDbResponseException
        Searches for movies by title. Gets all the results.
        Parameters:
        params - The list of parameters (Limit and Offset parameters will be ignored)
        Returns:
        The movie
        Throws:
        IMDbResponseException - Throws whether the server response is not a success.
